name: react-querybuilder
description: The React <QueryBuilder /> component for constructing queries

scripts.build: yarn build:main && yarn build:css && yarn build:types && yarn build:formatQuery && yarn build:parseSQL
scripts.build:css: sass --no-source-map src/query-builder.scss dist/query-builder.css && copyfiles -f src/query-builder.scss dist
scripts.prepare:build:types: copyfiles -f ./src/types/{basic,importExport,props,validation}.ts src/types/pre4.5 && replace '\./(ruleGroups)\b' '../$1' ./src/types/pre4.5/props.ts --silent && replace '\./(ruleGroups)\b' '../$1' ./src/types/pre4.5/validation.ts --silent && replace '\/\* begin temp' '/* begin temp */' src/types/pre4.5/index.ts --silent && replace 'end temp \*\/' '/* end temp */' src/types/pre4.5/index.ts --silent
scripts.finalize:build:types: replace 'import type' 'import' ./dist/types -r --silent && replace '\/\* begin temp \*\/' '/* begin temp' src/types/pre4.5/index.ts --silent && replace '\/\* end temp \*\/' 'end temp */' src/types/pre4.5/index.ts --silent && rimraf ./src/types/pre4.5/basic.ts ./src/types/pre4.5/importExport.ts ./src/types/pre4.5/props.ts ./src/types/pre4.5/validation.ts
scripts.generate-sqlparser: npx jison src/utils/parseSQL/sql.jison --outfile src/utils/parseSQL/sqlParser.js --module-type commonjs && npx jscodeshift -t src/utils/parseSQL/sqlParser.codemod.js src/utils/parseSQL/sqlParser.js && echo "\nexport default sqlParser;" >> src/utils/parseSQL/sqlParser.js
